title: HoP 289 - A Wing and a Prayer - Angels in Medieval Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 289 - A Wing and a Prayer - Angels in Medieval Philosophy
description: Be surprised by how many philosophical problems arise in connection with angels (how many can dance on the head of a pin is not one of them).
